title: Duwiiton#4888

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, guess a player's role. If correct, powerfully rampage at their house, cleaning your victims.
- At night, you may learn any player's role. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Before players die, they are informed that this role is visiting them. They have one chance to guess who is Duwiiton#4888. If correct, they don't die.
- You clean and kill roleblockers.
- You appear innocent until you have made your first kill.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

desc:
Post 4888
*i won't be here to grab the post when it comes up so here is my reference to my old discord tag*
*"I love guessing! wooo! I love anti-claim!"*
- *you, when you see my vision*
